item.title: Utiliser Traefik v2.2 pour auto-héberger votre 1er service.
item.description: Traefik is a modern reverse proxy that integrates with container technologies and related orchestrators. In our case we’re going to use it’s docker integration. Traefik uses docker socket to retrieve information about running containers, and labels that are attached to it. (if you use docker inspect you would get the idea.) This article requires that you are already familiar with container thechnology and especially docker. Disclaimer: This article is not meant to secure your services, it is a pretty basic setup to start with traefik, if you want to secure your services head to the next article of this series
